name: Beach Girls
description:
Beach Girls is physic puzzle game



Use your mouse to draw a path on the screen
Solve the puzzle and guide the ball into the cup
Complete great challenging puzzle by drawing shapes that react to physics
Test your physical skills and work out your brain.
Try this new and exciting game now!

Features of games:
• 50 good designed levels
• Addictive game play.
• Smooth Physic Drawing.
• Simple and Easy!
• Great exercise for the brain
